#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

ll mulmod(ll a, ll b, ll c) {
    ll x = 0;
    ll y = a%c;
    while(b>0) {
        if(b%2 == 1) {
            x = (x+y)%c;
        }
        y = (y+y)%c;
        b/=2;
    }
    return x%c;
}

ll modulo(ll a, ll b, ll c) {
    ll x = 1;
    ll y = a;
    while(b > 0) {
        if(b%2 == 1) {
            x = mulmod(x,y,c);
        }
        y = mulmod(y,y,c);
        b/=2;
    } 
    return x%c;
}

int main() {
	ll t,n;
	cin >> t >> n;
	while(t--) {
	    ll a,b;
	    cin >> a >> b;
	    cout << modulo(a,b,n) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
